@pixi/graphics > PIXI > LineStyle

PIXI.LineStyle 

class LineStyle extends PIXI.FillStyle

Represents the line style for Graphics.

Constructor

new PIXI.LineStyle() â†’ {}

Summary

Properties from LineStyle

number
alignment = 0.5

The alignment of any lines drawn (0.5 = middle, 1 = outer, 0 = inner). WebGL only.
PIXI.LINE_CAP
cap = PIXI.LINE_CAP.BUTT
PIXI.LINE_JOIN
join = PIXI.LINE_JOIN.MITER
number
miterLimit = 10

Miter limit.
boolean
native = false

If true the lines will be draw using LINES instead of TRIANGLE_STRIP.
number
width = 0

The width (thickness) of any lines drawn.
